list_definition.definition: a round flat piece of minced beef/ground beef which is cooked and served in a bread bun; hamburger

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She ordered a burger and fries.

list_definition.definition: (used in compounds) a type of burger made from meat, vegetables, or nuts

list_ex_of_english: When business goes up they are called for to serve more maxi-burgers.
